parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The application ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListEdgeContainerApps](~~ListEdgeContainerApps~~) operation.

parameters.name: DurationTime
parameters.description: The end time of the reservation. The input time is UTC. It takes +8 hours to enter Beijing time. For example, if the current time is 2006-01-02 06:04:05, you need to enter "2006-01-02T14:04:05Z".

parameters.name: Forever
parameters.description: Whether to permanently enable the reservation. Once it is enabled, you are not allowed to set the reservation deadline.
